an5.208:1.3: Acakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo na visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ pariyonandhati, bhattamassa nacchādeti.
an5.208:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā dantakaṭṭhassa akhādane.
an5.208:2.3: Cakkhussaṃ, mukhaṃ na duggandhaṃ hoti, rasaharaṇiyo visujjhanti, pittaṃ semhaṃ bhattaṃ na pariyonandhati, bhattamassa chādeti.
an5.208:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā dantakaṭṭhassa khādane”ti.
